title.rendered: UltraVault Service Launching In London, UK

content.rendered:
Where Should I Keep My Valuables?

Malca-Amit, one of the world’s biggest private vault operators, is proud to introduce its “UltraVault” service to London.

Launched in Singapore and Hong Kong in September 2016, UltraVault is a premium service, specifically designed for high net worth individuals who want to protect their valuables by storing them in a secured facility while still having access to them anywhere in the world. As the most exclusive safe deposit service in the market, UltraVault provides tailor-made solutions to storing and transporting treasured possessions.

When considering the risk of keeping your valuables at home, and the limitations of using the traditional safe deposit in a bank, the option of UltraVault starts to make sense – a global secured storage service without the limited opening hours and fixed locations of banks.

UltraVault boxes are stored in state of the art private vaults, operated by Malca-Amit, and when needed can be delivered to you at a time and place of your choice. UltraVault can accommodate goods of various sizes and privacy and confidentiality are paramount. Only the verified owner can access the safe-deposit box using dual-key security and tamperproof
seals.

UltraVault clients benefit from being outside the traditional banking and financial system, thereby diversifying and limiting their risk and exposure, while enjoying absolute discretion, confidentiality and flexibility. UltraVault is backed up by Malca-Amit’s extensive liability insurance policy placed with underwriters at Lloyd’s of London.

Malca-Amit provides the luxury goods industry, high net worth individuals, and international banks with a global team of experts, including logistics, security, customs house brokers and special operations professionals. With a worldwide network of Malca-Amit companies Malca-Amit can transport assets almost anywhere in the world.

Established in 1963, Malca-Amit is the world’s premier provider of wealth management logistics and transportation for valuable goods, precious metals, diamonds and jewellery.

More information on UltraVault is available on its website at www.ultra-vault.com, by email at info.lon@ultra-vault.com, or by phone on +44 207 841 5720.
